item.title: Coding in 2025
item.description:
Today I told myself I was going to learn to code my own blog to do as a project. I started with simple HTML googled a lot of stuff and in the end I did not like the result. I still lack the knowledge to make a crazy looking blog but in time I will.

So I did what every person does in 2025. “Hey Claude how in the hell do you make a blog” of course I provided links to blogs I liked. And 30 mins later bam it was done! Not great but better than what I can ever do. I will probably go back and make changes of course. As of right now the theme follows one of the Omarchy Themes Matte Black, but still lacks a lot.I can improve it for sure over time.
